title: What is African literature during the colonial period? - Quora

response.answer_text: That depends on which colony, which culture and during what time. There isn’t one answer. Initially the old oral or written literature continues. And as some people get educated in European ways, they start expressing the experiences and concerns in those new ways that divide into several streams of newspaper and political writing and a more literary and story telling way that aligns with the views and manners of the colonial power’s so gets called “literature.”
